note.p: Daughter of Arthur and Mary Elizabeth Heron of Isleworth, Middlesex. Married Frederick Allen at Poplar, Middlesex, in 1833. Resident of Down Lodge, Down, Kent.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/875/35/4).
London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.cin, accessed 2 October 2018)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 October 2018)
